languages.text: "После... некоторых событий, имевших место на корабле, я начала интересоваться призраками. На Футфоле я купила одну книгу — конечно, незаконную, — в которой описывается так называемый ритуал тишины. Он может успокоить буйные души в масштабах целого мира, но... Я не готова ручаться, что он безопасен".

"After... certain events on board, I became interested in ghosts. I bought a book on Footfall — an illegal one, of course — that describes a so-called Ritual of Silence. It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."
languages.original_text: "После... некоторых событий, имевших место на корабле, я начала интересоваться призраками. На Футфоле я купила одну книгу — конечно, незаконную, — в которой описывается так называемый ритуал тишины. Он может успокоить буйные души в масштабах целого мира, но... Я не готова ручаться, что он безопасен".

traits.locale_text: "After... some of the events that had taken place on the ship, I got interested in ghosts. While on Footfall, I bought a book — an illegal one, of course — that describes the so-called Ritual of Silence. It is said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I cannot vouch for the safety of this ritual".

It is said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I cannot vouch for the safety of this ritual".

It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."

It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."

languages.text: “船上……发生了某些事情之后，我对幽灵产生了兴趣。这本书我是在落脚港买的……当然，它是非法的，但它描述了某种叫做‘寂静仪式’的东西。据说，这种仪式可以在整个世界范围内安抚狂暴的精魂，但是……我没办法保证这个仪式的安全性。”
languages.original_text: "After... certain events on board, I became interested in ghosts. I bought a book on Footfall — an illegal one, of course — that describes a so-called Ritual of Silence. It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."

traits.locale_text: “船上……发生了某些事情之后，我对幽灵产生了兴趣。这本书我是在落脚港买的……当然，它是非法的，但它描述了某种叫做‘寂静仪式’的东西。据说，这种仪式可以在整个世界范围内安抚狂暴的精魂，但是……我没办法保证这个仪式的安全性。”
“在……见证了船上发生的某些事情之后，我对鬼魂产生了兴趣。我在落脚港上买了一本书……当然，它是非法的，但它描述了某种名为‘寂静仪式’的东西。据说，这种仪式可以在整个世界范围内安抚狂暴的精魂，但是……我无法确保这个仪式的安全性。”

languages.text: «Después de... ciertos acontecimientos en la nave, me interesé por los fantasmas. Compré un libro en Paso, ilegal, por supuesto, que describe el llamado Ritual del Silencio. Se dice que es capaz de apaciguar espíritus violentos a escala planetaria, pero... no puedo garantizar que sea seguro».
languages.original_text: "After... certain events on board, I became interested in ghosts. I bought a book on Footfall — an illegal one, of course — that describes a so-called Ritual of Silence. It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."

traits.locale_text: «Después de... ciertos acontecimientos en la nave, me interesé por los fantasmas. Compré un libro en Paso, ilegal, por supuesto, que describe el llamado Ritual del Silencio. Se dice que es capaz de apaciguar espíritus violentos a escala planetaria, pero... no puedo garantizar que sea seguro».

languages.text: 「その後...船で起こったいくつかの出来事で、ゴーストに興味を持ったんだ。フットフォールにいたとき、、書物を買ったんだ...むろん違法だが...なんちゃって沈黙の鎌の儀式がその書物に綴られている。全惑星規模で暴れる魂を鎮めることができると言われている、だが...この儀式の安全性を保証することはできない」
languages.original_text: "After... certain events on board, I became interested in ghosts. I bought a book on Footfall — an illegal one, of course — that describes a so-called Ritual of Silence. It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."

traits.locale_text: 「その後...船で起こったいくつかの出来事で、ゴーストに興味を持ったんだ。フットフォールにいたとき、、書物を買ったんだ...むろん違法だが...なんちゃって沈黙の鎌の儀式がその書物に綴られている。全惑星規模で暴れる魂を鎮めることができると言われている、だが...この儀式の安全性を保証することはできない」
「その後...船で起こったいくつかの出来事で、ゴーストに興味を持ったんだ。フットフォールにいたとき、、書物を買ったんだ...むろん違法だが...なんちゃって沈黙の鎌の儀式がその書物に綴られている。全惑星規模で暴れる魂を鎮めることができると言われている、だが...この儀式の安全性を保証することはできない」

languages.text: « À la suite de certains... événements à bord, les fantômes ont piqué mon intérêt. Sur Castel, j'ai acheté un ouvrage, évidemment interdit, qui décrit un certain "Rituel du Silence". Il serait capable de pacifier les esprits malveillants, et ce, à l'échelle d'une planète entière. Cependant, je ne peux garantir l'innocuité d'un rite d'une telle ampleur. »
languages.original_text: "After... certain events on board, I became interested in ghosts. I bought a book on Footfall — an illegal one, of course — that describes a so-called Ritual of Silence. It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."

traits.locale_text: « À la suite de certains... événements à bord, les fantômes ont piqué mon intérêt. Sur Castel, j'ai acheté un ouvrage, évidemment interdit, qui décrit un certain "Rituel du Silence". Il serait capable de pacifier les esprits malveillants, et ce, à l'échelle d'une planète entière. Cependant, je ne peux garantir l'innocuité d'un rite d'une telle ampleur. »

languages.text: "Gewisse ... Ereignisse an Bord weckten mein Interesse für Geister. Auf Footfall kaufte ich ein Buch – ein verbotenes Buch natürlich –, das ein sogenanntes Ritual des Schweigens beschreibt. Angeblich kann es gewalttätige Geister einer ganzen Welt besänftigen, aber ... Ich kann nicht für die Sicherheit dieses Rituals bürgen."
languages.original_text: "After... certain events on board, I became interested in ghosts. I bought a book on Footfall — an illegal one, of course — that describes a so-called Ritual of Silence. It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."

traits.locale_text: "Gewisse ... Ereignisse an Bord weckten mein Interesse für Geister. Auf Footfall kaufte ich ein Buch – ein verbotenes Buch natürlich –, das ein sogenanntes Ritual des Schweigens beschreibt. Angeblich kann es gewalttätige Geister einer ganzen Welt besänftigen, aber ... Ich kann nicht für die Sicherheit dieses Rituals bürgen."

"Nach ... einigen der Ereignisse auf dem Schiff habe ich begonnen, mich für Geister zu interessieren. Auf Footfall habe ich ein Buch gekauft ... ein illegales natürlich ... in dem ein so genanntes Ritual des Schweigens beschrieben wird. Angeblich soll es gewalttätige Geister auf einer gesamten Welt besänftigen können, aber ... ich kann nicht dafür bürgen, dass dieses Ritual wirklich ungefährlich ist."

languages.text: "Gemideki birtakım hadiselerin ardından hayaletlere karşı ilgim uyandı. Binliman'dayken bir kitap satın aldım. Yasa dışı bir kitap elbette... Bu kitap, sözüm ona Sükûnet Ayini'ni tanımlıyor. Bir dünyanın tamamı üzerindeki saldırgan ruhları yatıştırabildiğini söylüyor ancak... Bu ayinin güvenliliği konusunda kefil olamam."
languages.original_text: "After... certain events on board, I became interested in ghosts. I bought a book on Footfall — an illegal one, of course — that describes a so-called Ritual of Silence. It's said to be able to pacify violent spirits on the scale of an entire world, but... I can't vouch for the safety of this ritual."

Bu kitap, sözüm ona Sükûnet Ayini'ni tanımlıyor. Bir dünyanın tamamı üzerindeki saldırgan ruhları yatıştırabildiğini söylüyor ancak... Bu ayinin güvenliliği konusunda kefil olamam."
